comments:
I hit the following NPE when trying to move a nested type to a top-level type. The file in question has a .aj extension and it has pure Java code inside (it used to have AspectJ-specific code in it). I was able to work-around this problem by converting the file extension to be .java. After this, the refactoring worked correctly:
